item.title: The DC Universe Has Already Set Up Its Own Version Of The MCU's New Avengers Vs Avengers Conflict According To Explosive DC Theory
item.description: I'm realizing we could end up up with a really funny MCU/DCU parallel in the next few years when it comes to the "Justice Gang" and "New Avengers".

item.title: I've Figured Out Why Bucky Barnes Isn't Leading The New Avengers In The MCU (Because He's Doing Something Better)
item.description: While I was expecting Bucky Barnes to be the primary leader in Thunderbolts*, I think his actual role with the team is way better for the MCU hero.

item.title: “It’s Not One Film, It’s Two”: Mel Gibson Explains Why His “Massive” Resurrection Of The Christ Goes All The Way Back To The Fall Of The Angels
item.description: Exclusive: Mel Gibson addresses why the sequel of The Passion of the Christ took him eight years to make, teasing more to come after the 2026 movie.
